00033 
00034 ostream* os_ = 0;
00035 const double epsilon = 1e-12;
00036 
00037 
00038 template<class matrix_type>
00039 bool isUpperTriangular(const matrix_type& A, double eps)
00040 {
00041     typedef typename matrix_type::size_type size_type;
00042     bool upper = true;
00043     
00044     for (size_type i=1; i<A.size2() && upper; i++)
00045     {
00046         for (size_type j=0; j<i && upper; j++)
00047         {
00048             upper = fabs(A(i,j)) < eps;
00049         }
00050     }
00051 
00052     return upper;
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 void testReflector()
00057 {
00058     if (os_) *os_ << "testReflector() begin" << endl;
00059 
00060     dmatrix F(3,3);
00061     dvector x(3);
00062 
00063     x(0) = 1;
00064     x(1) = 1;
00065     x(2) = 0;
00066 
00067     Reflector(x, F);
00068 
00069     dvector v = prod(F, x);
00070 
00071     unit_assert_equal(fabs(v(0)), norm_2(x), epsilon);
00072     unit_assert_equal(v(1), 0, epsilon);
00073     unit_assert_equal(v(2), 0, epsilon);
00074     
00075     x(0) = -1;
00076     x(1) = 1;
00077     x(2) = 0;
00078 
00079     if (os_) *os_ << "testReflector() end" << endl;
00080 }
00081 
00082 void testQR()
00083 {
00084     if (os_) *os_ << "testQR() begin" << endl;
00085     
00086     dmatrix A(3,3);
00087     dmatrix Q(3,3);
00088     dmatrix R(3,3);
00089 
00090     for (dmatrix::size_type i=0; i< A.size1(); i++)
00091     {
00092         for (dmatrix::size_type j=0; j<A.size2(); j++)
00093         {
00094             A(i,j) = ((i==j) || (j == 0));
00095         }
00096     }
00097 
00098     try {
00099         qr<dmatrix>(A, Q, R);
00100 
00101         unit_assert(isUpperTriangular(R, epsilon));
00102 
00103         dmatrix diff = (A - prod(Q, R));
00104 
00105         unit_assert_equal(norm_1(diff), 0, epsilon);
00106 
00107         identity_matrix<dmatrix::value_type> eye(Q.size1());
00108         diff = prod(Q, herm(Q)) - eye;
00109         
00110         unit_assert_equal(norm_1(diff), 0, epsilon);        
00111     }
00112     catch (boost::numeric::ublas::bad_argument ba)
00113     {
00114         if (os_) *os_ << "exception: " << ba.what() << endl;
00115     }
00116     
00117     if (os_) *os_ << "testQR() end" << endl;
00118 }
00119 
00120 void testRectangularQR()
00121 {
00122     if (os_) *os_ << "testRectangularQR() begin" << endl;
00123     
00124     dmatrix A(5,3);
00125     dmatrix Q;
00126     dmatrix R;
00127 
00128     for (dmatrix::size_type i=0; i< A.size1(); i++)
00129     {
00130         for (dmatrix::size_type j=0; j<A.size2(); j++)
00131         {
00132             A(i,j) = ((i==j) || (j == 0));
00133         }
00134     }
00135 
00136     try {
00137         qr<dmatrix>(A, Q, R);
00138 
00139         unit_assert(isUpperTriangular(R, epsilon));
00140 
00141         dmatrix diff = (A - prod(Q, R));
00142 
00143         unit_assert_equal(norm_1(diff), 0, epsilon);
00144 
00145         identity_matrix<dmatrix::value_type> eye(Q.size1());
00146         diff = prod(Q, herm(Q)) - eye;
00147         
00148         unit_assert_equal(norm_1(diff), 0, epsilon);        
00149     }
00150     catch (boost::numeric::ublas::bad_argument ba)
00151     {
00152         if (os_) *os_ << "exception: " << ba.what() << endl;
00153     }
00154     
00155     if (os_) *os_ << "testRectangularQR() end" << endl;
00156 }
00157 
00158 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00159 {
00160     if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00161     if (os_) *os_ << "qrTest\n";
00162     testReflector();
00163     testQR();
00164     testRectangularQR();
00165 }
